name: Baggage (fiabot)
description:
Game made during a 28-hour train ride. 

Your big trip is coming up and you forgot to pack! You have to quickly decide how much you can fit in this Tetris-inspired puzzle game.  Drag and drop different colored blocks into your suitcase and see how much value you can fit before you have to leave. 

Game Design/Programming: Fiabot 

Art: Fiabot

Sound:  University of Games, cabled_mess

Music:  Cyberleaf Studio
